name: Dragoon Simulator
description:
This is a FFXIV parody fan game i made a while back some time between Heavensward and Stormblood. This was a project made in Unreal Engine 4 to test several features out. Please enjoy this old mini-game!

Note: My twitter handle has since changed form creating this. I am now @CGInvasion as opposed to @ChronoFan as written in the credits.
